synopsis.text: Engine ered to combat a deadly virus, the crew of Annex I, led by Akari Hizamaru, embarks on a perilous mission to Mars in the year 2060. Their objective: to gather samples of the colossal cockroach-human hybrids, the Terraformars, in a desperate bid to save humanity from the lethal Alien Engine Virus. As they confront these monstrous creatures, the crew discovers a sinister undercurrent: not all squadrons share their goal to rescue humanity. Instead, some harbor hidden agendas, fueling a ruthless battle for supremacy amidst the chaos of survival. Witness the thrilling saga of Terra Formars Revenge, where the crew must not only face the mutated horrors of Mars but also the treachery lurking within their own ranks. The fight for survival has just begun, and the stakes have never been higher.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
